profileAlternative.name: Sascha Strand
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer at CommonBond.co
profileAlternative.summary: I’ve been a software engineer for five years, and I’ve just completed my MS in computer science, focusing in language design, operating systems, and parallelism. I am pursuing back-end development roles in the New York City area.

aboutAlternative.text: I’ve been a software engineer for five years, and I’ve just completed my MS in computer science, focusing in language design, operating systems, and parallelism. I am pursuing back-end development roles in the New York City area.

positions.title: Portland State University
positions.description:
• Teach a 300 level operating systems course
• Develop and teach a functional programming lab in Haskell
• Write assignments and exams and lecture 4-8 hours per week

positions.title:
Title
Graduate Student Instructor
positions.description:
• Teach a 300 level operating systems course
• Develop and teach a functional programming lab in Haskell
• Write assignments and exams and lecture 4-8 hours per week

positions.title:
Title
Graduate Teaching Assistant
positions.description:
• Developed and taught a comparative programming language course in Python, C, and Haskell
• Led recitations on topics from algorithms and complexity to systems programming

positions.title: Software Development Intern, Team Lead
positions.description:
• Led a team of interns developing a full-stack media storage and player application
• Multithreaded processes for media management throughout this application's backend
• Contributed to an MVC app's front end development in React
• Expanded HATEOAS API endpoints in an existing Java Spring server

positions.title: Software Development Intern
positions.description:
• Built a stand-alone service in Go to process and store log data in production
• Developed AWS lambdas and Athena tables to process data for BI tools
• Added RESTful endpoints to deployed services
• Auto-provisioned virtual machines for local testing with ansible and vagrant

positions.title: ETL Developer, Data Manager
positions.description:
• Developed an application to provide real-time sampling permit compliance feedback
• Scripted the ETL of numerous data sources using R
• Wrote custom parsers for malformatted JSON and XML

positions.title: Bookkeeper
positions.description:
• Generated reports for operations and payroll
• Ensured payment from clients and to vendors
• Managed a youth outreach program with local schools and non-profits

positions.title: Chemistry Lab Tech
positions.description:
• Repaired and maintained lab equipment
• Managed hazardous materials
• Prepared experimental demonstrations

positions.title: Electrical Technician
positions.description:
During summers:
• Installed solar arrays and inversion systems
• Worked with customers to prevent and troubleshoot outages
• Coordinated supply chain logistics

positions.title: Research Assistant
positions.description:
• Assistant to Dr. Sharon Staton Russell, Immigration Policy Researcher
• Provided technical support for research operations
• Managed Dr. Russell's contacts and communications
